content.raw: Yeah, or we can just ignore this PR until it adds more stuff that actually uses the HAVE_OSVR variable. I wasn't sure what granularity of PR is desired. [Here is an overview of the OSVR architecture](https://osvr.github.io/whitepapers/introduction_to_osvr/)  , and [here are the OSVR ClientKit C++ docs](http://resource.osvr.com/docs/OSVR-Core/TopicWritingClientApplication.html).
content.html: Yeah, or we can just ignore this PR until it adds more stuff that actually uses the HAVE_OSVR variable. I wasn't sure what granularity of PR is desired. Here is an overview of the OSVR architecture , and here are the OSVR ClientKit C++ docs.
